comment.body: One complication in using `wget` to mirror a site to ZeroNet is the unusually restricted set of [characters allowed in filenames](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:7_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t/+ASCII+encoded+filenames).  `wget` has a `-k` option that would adjust HTML links to reference the files `wget` downloaded to; however, ZeroNet's character set is far more restrictive than the character sets `wget` knows how to sanitize (even `%` is forbidden).
